pageSetting.title: 个人存贷款业绩明细

attribute.value: select ywlb as key,ms as value from csb_ywlb where ywlb in ('01','02')
select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='DKYJGXMS'
select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='CKYJGXMS'

select.isEqual: select a.tjrq, a.jgdh, a.jgmc, a.hydh, a.hymc, a.khh, a.zhdh, a.zzh,a.zhhm, a.zhye, a.hyye, a.zhjs*a.zlbl*0.01 zhjs, a.gxfp, a.kmh, a.qx, a.qxmc, a.khrq, a.xhrq, a.qsrq, a.jsrq ,a.jxdxdh from ( select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh,zh.zzh, zh.zhhm, mx.zhye,mx.zhye as hyye, jszh.zhjs zhjs , '百分比:100' as gxfp, zh.kmh, zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, '$zhlx$' zhlx, 100 as zlbl, zh.xhrq, zh.khrq as qsrq, zh.xhrq as jsrq,zh.jxdxdh from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join jxdx_ckzhmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ mx on mx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between mx.qsrq and mx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join jxdx_ckjszh_$tjrq_yyyy$ jszh on jszh.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and jszh.tjrq = $tjrq_yyyy$0101 left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=1 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '$zhqy$%' and $tjrq$ between zh.khrq and zh.xhrq union all select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh, zh.zzh,zh.zhhm, mx.zhye, case when gx.gxhslx ='1' then mx.zhye*gx.zlbl*0.01 when gx.gxhslx='2' and gx.yz>=mx.zhye then mx.zhye*gx.clbl*0.01 else (mx.zhye-gx.yz)*gx.zlbl*0.01+gx.yz*gx.clbl*0.01 end as hyye, jszh.zhjs zhjs , case when gx.gxhslx ='0' then '百分比:100' when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl ) else '阈值:'||f_numtochar(gx.yz ) ||', 阈值以上:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl ) ||', 阈值以下'||f_numtochar(gx.clbl ) end as gxfp, zh.kmh, zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, '$zhlx$' zhlx, gx.zlbl, zh.xhrq, gx.qsrq, gx.jsrq ,zh.jxdxdh from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join jxdx_ckzhmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ mx on mx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between mx.qsrq and mx.jsrq inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_ck gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join jxdx_ckjszh_$tjrq_yyyy$ jszh on jszh.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and jszh.tjrq = $tjrq_yyyy$0101 left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=1 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '%$zhqy$%' )a order by a.qsrq desc

select tjrq, jgdh, jgmc, hydh, hymc,khh,zhdh,zzh,zhhm,zhye,hyye,zcye,yqye, daizhiye,daizhangye,gxfp,kmh,yqkm,daizhikm,daizhangkm,qx, qxmc,khrq,ffrq,dqrq,xhrq,qsrq,jsrq,wjfl,jxdxdh,zhjs from ( select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh,zh.zzh, zh.zhhm, (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) zhye, (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) hyye, yemx.zcye,yemx.yqye,yemx.daizhiye,yemx.daizhangye, '百分比:100' as gxfp, zh.kmh,zh.yqkm,zh.daizhikm,zh.daizhangkm,zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, zh.ffrq, zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq, zh.khrq qsrq, zh.xhrq jsrq, case when coalesce(cdmms.dmms,'0.0') ='0.0' then '正常' else cdmms.dmms end wjfl,zh.jxdxdh ,'$zhlx$' zhlx,jszh.zhjs zhjs from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join jxdx_dkzhyemx_$tjrq_yyyy$ yemx on yemx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between yemx.qsrq and yemx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join jxdx_dkjszh_$tjrq_yyyy$ jszh on jszh.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and jszh.tjrq = $tjrq_yyyy$0101 left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=2 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx left join jxdx_wjflmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ wjfl on wjfl.jxdxdh=zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between wjfl.qsrq and wjfl.jsrq left join csb_dmms cdmms on cdmms.dmz=wjfl.wjfl and cdmms.dmmc='DKWJFL' where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '%$zhqy$%' union all select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh, zh.zzh,zh.zhhm, (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) as zhye, case when gx.gxhslx ='1' then (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0))*gx.zlbl*0.01 when gx.gxhslx='2' and gx.yz>=(coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) then (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0))*gx.clbl*0.01 else ((coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0))-gx.yz)*gx.zlbl*0.01+gx.yz*gx.clbl*0.01 end as hyye, yemx.zcye,yemx.yqye,yemx.daizhiye,yemx.daizhangye, case when gx.gxhslx ='0' then '百分比:100' when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl ) else '阈值:'||f_numtochar(gx.yz )||', 阈值以上:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl )||', 阈值以下'||f_numtochar(gx.clbl ) end as gxfp, zh.kmh,zh.yqkm,zh.daizhikm,zh.daizhangkm,zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, zh.ffrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq, gx.qsrq, gx.jsrq, case when coalesce(cdmms.dmms,'0.0') ='0.0' then '正常' else cdmms.dmms end wjfl,zh.jxdxdh ,'$zhlx$' zhlx,jszh.zhjs zhjs from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join jxdx_dkzhyemx_$tjrq_yyyy$ yemx on yemx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between yemx.qsrq and yemx.jsrq inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_dk gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join jxdx_dkjszh_$tjrq_yyyy$ jszh on jszh.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and jszh.tjrq = $tjrq_yyyy$0101 left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=2 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx left join jxdx_wjflmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ wjfl on wjfl.jxdxdh=zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between wjfl.qsrq and wjfl.jsrq left join csb_dmms cdmms on cdmms.dmz=wjfl.wjfl and cdmms.dmmc='DKWJFL' where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '%$zhqy$%' )a order by a.qsrq desc

select a.tjrq, a.jgdh, a.jgmc, a.hydh, a.hymc, a.khh, a.zhdh, a.zhhm,a.zzh, a.zhye, a.hyye, a.gxfp, a.kmh, a.qx, a.qxmc, a.khrq, a.xhrq, a.qsrq, a.jsrq ,a.jxdxdh from ( select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh,zh.zzh, zh.zhhm, mx.zhye,mx.zhye as hyye, '百分比:100' as gxfp, zh.kmh, zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, '$zhlx$' zhlx, 100 as zlbl, zh.xhrq, zh.khrq as qsrq, zh.xhrq as jsrq,zh.jxdxdh from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join jxdx_ckzhmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ mx on mx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between mx.qsrq and mx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=1 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '%$zhqy$%' and $tjrq$ between zh.khrq and zh.xhrq union all select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh, zh.zzh,zh.zhhm, mx.zhye, case when gx.gxhslx ='1' then mx.zhye*gx.zlbl*0.01 when gx.gxhslx='2' and gx.yz>=mx.zhye then mx.zhye*gx.clbl*0.01 else (mx.zhye-gx.yz)*gx.zlbl*0.01+gx.yz*gx.clbl*0.01 end as hyye, case when gx.gxhslx ='0' then '百分比:100' when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl ) else '阈值:'||f_numtochar(gx.yz ) ||', 阈值以上:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl ) ||', 阈值以下'||f_numtochar(gx.clbl ) end as gxfp, zh.kmh, zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, '$zhlx$' zhlx, gx.zlbl, zh.xhrq, gx.qsrq, gx.jsrq ,zh.jxdxdh from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join jxdx_ckzhmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ mx on mx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between mx.qsrq and mx.jsrq inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_ck gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=1 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '%$zhqy$%' )a order by a.qsrq desc

select tjrq, jgdh, jgmc, hydh, hymc,khh,zhdh,zhhm, zzh , zhye,hyye,zcye,yqye, daizhiye,daizhangye,gxfp,kmh,yqkm,daizhikm,daizhangkm,qx, qxmc,khrq,ffrq,dqrq,xhrq,qsrq,jsrq,wjfl,jxdxdh from ( select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh,zh.zzh, zh.zhhm, (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) zhye, (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) hyye, yemx.zcye,yemx.yqye,yemx.daizhiye,yemx.daizhangye, '百分比:100' as gxfp, zh.kmh,zh.yqkm,zh.daizhikm,zh.daizhangkm,zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, zh.ffrq, zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq, zh.khrq qsrq, zh.xhrq jsrq, case when coalesce(cdmms.dmms,'0.0') ='0.0' then '正常' else cdmms.dmms end wjfl,zh.jxdxdh from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join jxdx_dkzhyemx_$tjrq_yyyy$ yemx on yemx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between yemx.qsrq and yemx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=2 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx left join jxdx_wjflmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ wjfl on wjfl.jxdxdh=zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between wjfl.qsrq and wjfl.jsrq left join csb_dmms cdmms on cdmms.dmz=wjfl.wjfl and cdmms.dmmc='DKWJFL' where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '%$zhqy$%' union all select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh,zh.zzh, zh.zhhm, (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) as zhye, case when gx.gxhslx ='1' then (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0))*gx.zlbl*0.01 when gx.gxhslx='2' and gx.yz>=(coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) then (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0))*gx.clbl*0.01 else ((coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0))-gx.yz)*gx.zlbl*0.01+gx.yz*gx.clbl*0.01 end as hyye, yemx.zcye,yemx.yqye,yemx.daizhiye,yemx.daizhangye, case when gx.gxhslx ='0' then '百分比:100' when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl ) else '阈值:'||f_numtochar(gx.yz )||', 阈值以上:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl )||', 阈值以下'||f_numtochar(gx.clbl ) end as gxfp, zh.kmh,zh.yqkm,zh.daizhikm,zh.daizhangkm,zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, zh.ffrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq, gx.qsrq, gx.jsrq, case when coalesce(cdmms.dmms,'0.0') ='0.0' then '正常' else cdmms.dmms end wjfl,zh.jxdxdh from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join jxdx_dkzhyemx_$tjrq_yyyy$ yemx on yemx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between yemx.qsrq and yemx.jsrq inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_dk gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=2 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx left join jxdx_wjflmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ wjfl on wjfl.jxdxdh=zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between wjfl.qsrq and wjfl.jsrq left join csb_dmms cdmms on cdmms.dmz=wjfl.wjfl and cdmms.dmmc='DKWJFL' where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '%$zhqy$%' )a order by a.qsrq desc

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select a.tjrq, a.jgdh, a.jgmc, a.hydh, a.hymc, a.khh, a.zhdh, a.zzh,a.zhhm, a.zhye, a.hyye, a.zhjs*a.zlbl*0.01 zhjs, a.gxfp, a.kmh, a.qx, a.qxmc, a.khrq, a.xhrq, a.qsrq, a.jsrq ,a.jxdxdh from ( select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh,zh.zzh, zh.zhhm, mx.zhye,mx.zhye as hyye, jszh.zhjs zhjs , '百分比:100' as gxfp, zh.kmh, zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, '$zhlx$' zhlx, 100 as zlbl, zh.xhrq, zh.khrq as qsrq, zh.xhrq as jsrq,zh.jxdxdh from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join jxdx_ckzhmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ mx on mx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between mx.qsrq and mx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join jxdx_ckjszh_$tjrq_yyyy$ jszh on jszh.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and jszh.tjrq = $tjrq_yyyy$0101 left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=1 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '$zhqy$%' and $tjrq$ between zh.khrq and zh.xhrq union all select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh, zh.zzh,zh.zhhm, mx.zhye, case when gx.gxhslx ='1' then mx.zhye*gx.zlbl*0.01 when gx.gxhslx='2' and gx.yz>=mx.zhye then mx.zhye*gx.clbl*0.01 else (mx.zhye-gx.yz)*gx.zlbl*0.01+gx.yz*gx.clbl*0.01 end as hyye, jszh.zhjs zhjs , case when gx.gxhslx ='0' then '百分比:100' when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl ) else '阈值:'||f_numtochar(gx.yz ) ||', 阈值以上:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl ) ||', 阈值以下'||f_numtochar(gx.clbl ) end as gxfp, zh.kmh, zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, '$zhlx$' zhlx, gx.zlbl, zh.xhrq, gx.qsrq, gx.jsrq ,zh.jxdxdh from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join jxdx_ckzhmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ mx on mx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between mx.qsrq and mx.jsrq inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_ck gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join jxdx_ckjszh_$tjrq_yyyy$ jszh on jszh.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and jszh.tjrq = $tjrq_yyyy$0101 left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=1 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '%$zhqy$%' )a order by a.qsrq desc
select tjrq, jgdh, jgmc, hydh, hymc,khh,zhdh,zzh,zhhm,zhye,hyye,zcye,yqye, daizhiye,daizhangye,gxfp,kmh,yqkm,daizhikm,daizhangkm,qx, qxmc,khrq,ffrq,dqrq,xhrq,qsrq,jsrq,wjfl,jxdxdh,zhjs from ( select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh,zh.zzh, zh.zhhm, (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) zhye, (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) hyye, yemx.zcye,yemx.yqye,yemx.daizhiye,yemx.daizhangye, '百分比:100' as gxfp, zh.kmh,zh.yqkm,zh.daizhikm,zh.daizhangkm,zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, zh.ffrq, zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq, zh.khrq qsrq, zh.xhrq jsrq, case when coalesce(cdmms.dmms,'0.0') ='0.0' then '正常' else cdmms.dmms end wjfl,zh.jxdxdh ,'$zhlx$' zhlx,jszh.zhjs zhjs from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join jxdx_dkzhyemx_$tjrq_yyyy$ yemx on yemx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between yemx.qsrq and yemx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join jxdx_dkjszh_$tjrq_yyyy$ jszh on jszh.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and jszh.tjrq = $tjrq_yyyy$0101 left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=2 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx left join jxdx_wjflmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ wjfl on wjfl.jxdxdh=zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between wjfl.qsrq and wjfl.jsrq left join csb_dmms cdmms on cdmms.dmz=wjfl.wjfl and cdmms.dmmc='DKWJFL' where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '%$zhqy$%' union all select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh, zh.zzh,zh.zhhm, (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) as zhye, case when gx.gxhslx ='1' then (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0))*gx.zlbl*0.01 when gx.gxhslx='2' and gx.yz>=(coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) then (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0))*gx.clbl*0.01 else ((coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0))-gx.yz)*gx.zlbl*0.01+gx.yz*gx.clbl*0.01 end as hyye, yemx.zcye,yemx.yqye,yemx.daizhiye,yemx.daizhangye, case when gx.gxhslx ='0' then '百分比:100' when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl ) else '阈值:'||f_numtochar(gx.yz )||', 阈值以上:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl )||', 阈值以下'||f_numtochar(gx.clbl ) end as gxfp, zh.kmh,zh.yqkm,zh.daizhikm,zh.daizhangkm,zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, zh.ffrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq, gx.qsrq, gx.jsrq, case when coalesce(cdmms.dmms,'0.0') ='0.0' then '正常' else cdmms.dmms end wjfl,zh.jxdxdh ,'$zhlx$' zhlx,jszh.zhjs zhjs from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join jxdx_dkzhyemx_$tjrq_yyyy$ yemx on yemx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between yemx.qsrq and yemx.jsrq inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_dk gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join jxdx_dkjszh_$tjrq_yyyy$ jszh on jszh.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and jszh.tjrq = $tjrq_yyyy$0101 left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=2 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx left join jxdx_wjflmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ wjfl on wjfl.jxdxdh=zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between wjfl.qsrq and wjfl.jsrq left join csb_dmms cdmms on cdmms.dmz=wjfl.wjfl and cdmms.dmmc='DKWJFL' where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '%$zhqy$%' )a order by a.qsrq desc
select a.tjrq, a.jgdh, a.jgmc, a.hydh, a.hymc, a.khh, a.zhdh, a.zhhm,a.zzh, a.zhye, a.hyye, a.gxfp, a.kmh, a.qx, a.qxmc, a.khrq, a.xhrq, a.qsrq, a.jsrq ,a.jxdxdh from ( select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh,zh.zzh, zh.zhhm, mx.zhye,mx.zhye as hyye, '百分比:100' as gxfp, zh.kmh, zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, '$zhlx$' zhlx, 100 as zlbl, zh.xhrq, zh.khrq as qsrq, zh.xhrq as jsrq,zh.jxdxdh from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join jxdx_ckzhmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ mx on mx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between mx.qsrq and mx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=1 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '%$zhqy$%' and $tjrq$ between zh.khrq and zh.xhrq union all select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh, zh.zzh,zh.zhhm, mx.zhye, case when gx.gxhslx ='1' then mx.zhye*gx.zlbl*0.01 when gx.gxhslx='2' and gx.yz>=mx.zhye then mx.zhye*gx.clbl*0.01 else (mx.zhye-gx.yz)*gx.zlbl*0.01+gx.yz*gx.clbl*0.01 end as hyye, case when gx.gxhslx ='0' then '百分比:100' when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl ) else '阈值:'||f_numtochar(gx.yz ) ||', 阈值以上:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl ) ||', 阈值以下'||f_numtochar(gx.clbl ) end as gxfp, zh.kmh, zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, '$zhlx$' zhlx, gx.zlbl, zh.xhrq, gx.qsrq, gx.jsrq ,zh.jxdxdh from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join jxdx_ckzhmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ mx on mx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between mx.qsrq and mx.jsrq inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_ck gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=1 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '%$zhqy$%' )a order by a.qsrq desc
select tjrq, jgdh, jgmc, hydh, hymc,khh,zhdh,zhhm, zzh , zhye,hyye,zcye,yqye, daizhiye,daizhangye,gxfp,kmh,yqkm,daizhikm,daizhangkm,qx, qxmc,khrq,ffrq,dqrq,xhrq,qsrq,jsrq,wjfl,jxdxdh from ( select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh,zh.zzh, zh.zhhm, (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) zhye, (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) hyye, yemx.zcye,yemx.yqye,yemx.daizhiye,yemx.daizhangye, '百分比:100' as gxfp, zh.kmh,zh.yqkm,zh.daizhikm,zh.daizhangkm,zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, zh.ffrq, zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq, zh.khrq qsrq, zh.xhrq jsrq, case when coalesce(cdmms.dmms,'0.0') ='0.0' then '正常' else cdmms.dmms end wjfl,zh.jxdxdh from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join jxdx_dkzhyemx_$tjrq_yyyy$ yemx on yemx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between yemx.qsrq and yemx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=2 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx left join jxdx_wjflmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ wjfl on wjfl.jxdxdh=zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between wjfl.qsrq and wjfl.jsrq left join csb_dmms cdmms on cdmms.dmz=wjfl.wjfl and cdmms.dmmc='DKWJFL' where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '%$zhqy$%' union all select $tjrq$ as tjrq, jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, zh.khh, zh.zhdh,zh.zzh, zh.zhhm, (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) as zhye, case when gx.gxhslx ='1' then (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0))*gx.zlbl*0.01 when gx.gxhslx='2' and gx.yz>=(coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0)) then (coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0))*gx.clbl*0.01 else ((coalesce(yemx.zcye,0)+coalesce(yemx.yqye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhiye,0)+coalesce(yemx.daizhangye,0))-gx.yz)*gx.zlbl*0.01+gx.yz*gx.clbl*0.01 end as hyye, yemx.zcye,yemx.yqye,yemx.daizhiye,yemx.daizhangye, case when gx.gxhslx ='0' then '百分比:100' when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl ) else '阈值:'||f_numtochar(gx.yz )||', 阈值以上:'||f_numtochar(gx.zlbl )||', 阈值以下'||f_numtochar(gx.clbl ) end as gxfp, zh.kmh,zh.yqkm,zh.daizhikm,zh.daizhangkm,zh.qx, cqx.qxmc, zh.khrq, zh.ffrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq, gx.qsrq, gx.jsrq, case when coalesce(cdmms.dmms,'0.0') ='0.0' then '正常' else cdmms.dmms end wjfl,zh.jxdxdh from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join jxdx_dkzhyemx_$tjrq_yyyy$ yemx on yemx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between yemx.qsrq and yemx.jsrq inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_dk gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh left join csb_qxsdb cqx on cqx.jxdxlx=2 and zh.qx between cqx.qsqx and cqx.jsqx left join jxdx_wjflmx_$tjrq_yyyy$ wjfl on wjfl.jxdxdh=zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between wjfl.qsrq and wjfl.jsrq left join csb_dmms cdmms on cdmms.dmz=wjfl.wjfl and cdmms.dmmc='DKWJFL' where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zh.zhdh like '%$zhqy$%' )a order by a.qsrq desc ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select ywlb as key,ms as value from csb_ywlb where ywlb in ('01','02')
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='DKYJGXMS'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='CKYJGXMS'
